summary: Harry Habert, owner of a rent office has an original idea: To rent babies from a nearby orphanage to the local families. He rents the Ward brothers to his first customers.
cast: Leslie Nielsen|Christopher Lloyd|Matt McCoy|Sherry Miller|Amos Crawley|Cody Jones|Tabitha Lupien|Tony Rosato|Lisa LaCroix|Kevin Hicks|Tannis Burnett|Edward Heeley|Judah Katz|Ellen-Ray Hennessy|Michael Anderson Jr.|Amanda Tapping|Walter Alza|Victoria Mitchell|Paul Brown|Warren Davis|Stink Fisher|Arlene Meadows|Lenore Zann|Nicholas Rice|John French|Kelli Fox|David Fraser|Sheila Brand|Christian Laurin
title: Familia de alquiler
